'''Gary''' is a friend of Dixon's who used their friendship to skip inspections.

==History==
Gary was starting a new business in Seattle. Since he was friends with [[Michael Dixon]], he was assured that the permits would be taken care of. Dixon then passed it on to Sullivan to approve without inspection. Sullivan misunderstood what was happening and sent Vic and Travis there to do an inspection. Gary immediately tried to send them away. They called Sullivan, who realized what he'd done and told them to go home, despite them having noticed multiple fire hazards.

==Relationships==
===Friendships===
He and [[Michael Dixon]] are friends.

==Career==
He is the owner of South Seattle Home Center at 2377 Shoreline Way, Seattle, Washington 91428.
